name: The God of The Universe
description:
You are the god of the universe. One day, your peace is disturbed by a fleet of space demolition team trying to take you down. Even though you cannot directly fight back, fortunately, there are multiple tiny black holes sending out small planets. Utilize the different planets' properties to fight back and dodge their lasers.

This arcade-style game has only one input - just grab and throw.

When you're done please use the in-game quit function to have a fun surprise!

[Controls]

Grip - Grab

Right stick - snap turn

Both stick click at the same time in game - quit

Have fun!
